enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: Co-Chair Newton Paciornik (Brazil) reported on an informal group meeting in which delegates had reviewed the 'conservativeness factor' tables.
Delegates discussed text in the annex of a draft COP 11 and COP/MOP 1 decision (FCCC/SBSTA/2005/2), including on adjustments relating to overestimation of removals from LULUCF activities.
A drafting group will continue informal consultations.
